Package ePortfolio

Class MutualFund

java.lang.Object
ePortfolio.Investment
ePortfolio.MutualFund
public class MutualFund extends Investment
The class is an object class that acts like a Mutual Fund, it is a child class that inherits Investment. The class can calculate book value, payment values, modify and calculate investment sales as well as their gain, calculate a predicted gain of the investment, and refine the output of the monetary values.
